name: EGO experiment
description:
Minimalistic arcade game with fast-paced gameplay, transhumanistic plot, and with a little bit of melancholy in it's spirit. 

Melancholy - because it is hard to be optimistic, when you are uploaded in neuronet and destined to die again and again inside of it, right?..

Better play in Chrome or Firefox. Safari has some graphic bugs. Other browsers haven't been tested.

code and graphics by: Greeny7

voice acting by: Chlora_Virgo

soundtrack by: Nafantemar

Also, I wrote an article about this game's creation - https://greeny7.com/posts/ego-experiment
